text: Sir Robert James Buckland (born 22 September 1968) is a British politician. He was Secretary of State for Wales from 7 July 2022 to 25 October 2022. Buckland was the Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice from July 2019 until September 2021. He is a member of the Conservative Party. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Swindon South from 2010 to 2024. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Lord Chancellors Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Members of the Privy Council of the United Kingdom Category:Secretaries of State for Wales Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024
title: Robert Buckland
